title: Secure Health Data Access Management
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want role-based access controls for caregiver permissions so that I can securely access my patients' health data while respecting their privacy preferences.

title: Flexible Learning Options for Feature Familiarization
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to explore new health tech features at my own pace so that I can independently use digital tools to support my rural patients without feeling constrained by structured walkthroughs.

title: Customizable Dashboard for Patient Monitoring
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to customize my dashboard layout to prioritize the health metrics of my patients so that I can efficiently track their progression and respond to their needs without unnecessary navigation.

title: Comprehensive Data Privacy Controls
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to have user-defined privacy settings for data sharing so that I can access necessary health data while respecting my patients' privacy preferences.

title: Health Data Integration
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to easily import and export patient health records from third-party systems so that I can analyze trends and monitor my patients' health progression effectively.

title: Knowledge Base Access for Independent Learning
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want access to a comprehensive knowledge base so that I can explore system features at my own pace and improve my ability to support my rural patients.

title: Custom Health Trend Reporting
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to generate custom reports on patient health trends over time so that I can analyze patterns and identify early warning signs to improve care strategies.

title: Real-Time Patient Monitoring Updates
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive real-time updates on my patients' health status so that I can monitor their vital signs efficiently and respond proactively to any changes.
